#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#define MAX 20000
using namespace std;
char HASH[6][10]={"ate","wait","great","for","before"};
void check(char[]);
int main()
{
    char str[MAX];
    int tcase;
    scanf("%d",&tcase);
    while(tcase--)
    {
        scanf(" %[^\n\r]",str);
        char *p;
        p=strtok(str," ");
       // check(p);
        while(p)
        {
            check(p);
            p=strtok(NULL," ");
        }
        printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
void check(char s[])
{
    if(strcmp(s,"8")==0)
        printf("%s ",HASH[0]);
    else if(strcmp(s,"w8")==0)
        printf("%s ",HASH[1]);
    else if(strcmp(s,"gr8")==0)
        printf("%s ",HASH[2]);
    else if(strcmp(s,"4")==0)
        printf("%s ",HASH[3]);
    else if(strcmp(s,"b4")==0)
        printf("%s ",HASH[4]);
    else printf("%s ",s);
}
